DataElement.preferredName: Skin Response Date of Reference Time Point
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date of the reference time point represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Skin Response Domain Date of Therapeutic Procedure

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the date of the [int
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the date of the [intervention] performed to elicit the skin response?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record date of the test material administration using this format (DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: SRRFTDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable SRRFTDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: A complete date is expected. If the date of administration is collected on a separate CRF (e.g., VISDAT), then it should not be collected on the Skin Response CRF.
